top.title: US carries out 'massive' strike against IS in Syria
top.summary: The US says it struck dozens of targets across Syria in response to last week's deadly Islamic State attack on US forces there.

top.title: Imran Khan and wife given further jail terms after state gift fraud case
top.summary: Pakistan's former PM, who is already serving time in prison, plans to challenge the verdict.

top.title: Putin vows no more wars if West treats Russia with respect
top.summary: Russia's leader said during a TV marathon that claims that an attack on Europe was planned were "nonsense".

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?

top.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.
